item.title: Papers read in 2023.10
item.description: Measurements of UWB through-the-wall propagation using spectrum analyzer and the Hilbert transform DOI https://doi.org/10.1002/mop.23107 Abstract 本文讲解了如何利用spectrum analyzer去测量UWB穿墙特性。本文的关键点在于利用Hilbert变换去retrieve phase information。这样就可以不使用昂贵的VNA设备去进行UWB穿墙特性的测量。

item.title: Problem
item.description: UWB signal ejection S parameter -> Frequency spectrum Know why VNA don’t have time domain (circuit view)

item.title: Spectrum Analyzer
item.description: What is spectrum analyzer? Measure input signal power spectrum Spectrum Analyzer for UWB Papers Measurements of UWB through-the-wall propagation using spectrum analyzer and the Hilbert transform pdf - Measurements of UWB through-the-wall propagation using spectrum analyzer and the Hilbert transform
